actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-528, by Mr. Wheat.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4785 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. It shall be in order to consider an amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Energy and Commerce now printed in the bill as an original bill for the purpose of amendment. No amendment to said substitute shall be in order except the amendments printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, debatable for the period specified and not subject to amendment except as specified in the report. The amendments of Mr. Madigan shall be considered en bloc. Measure will be read by section. Specified amendments are in order. Upon passage of H.R. 4785, it shall be in order to take from the Speaker's table the bill S. 2240 and to consider said bill in the House. It shall then be in ...
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 117.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 308 - 109 (Roll No. 164).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4785) to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of grants to provide preventive health services with respect to acquired immune deficiency syndrome, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4785 (AIDS treatment programs).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4785) to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of grants to provide preventive health services with respect to acquired immune deficiency syndrome, and for other purposes.
